reviews.title: Great hotel - great location!
reviews.text: We spent 4 nights at the Marina Club this February and can thoroughly endorse the other complimentary reviews. We booked with bookinhotels.com which seemed the best deal at the time we looked - £209 for 4 nights B&B. Upon arrival we upgraded to a marina view/pool view suite for an additional 14 euros per night and were given splendid accommodation which would have been perfectly adequate for 4 people. The internal décor is a very attractive marble and stone theme and the corridors have sensor lighting and are never dull and gloomy. There was a very spacious bedroom with an additional spacious lounge with two sofas (which would have been fine for beds for children). Along one wall was a fully fitted and well equipped modern kitchen with larder fridge, microwave, cooker and 4 ring hob as well as the essential kettle! The balcony was big enough to sit on (yes – it was often warm enough even in February).Digital TV with English channels.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly and helpful and breakfast, included in the price we paid – (but watch out - some booking agencies don’t include this) was self-service continental and fine for our needs.
reviews.title: Spacious, clean, convenient, reasonable priced
